report.title: My Sites (JBC, Reptilewatch L2 refugia)
report.description: A list of refugia for Reptilewatch L2.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations lp on lp.id=l.parent_id AND lp.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt ON lt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false #joins# #agreements_join# WHERE (#sharing_filter#) AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) AND l.deleted=false AND l.created_by_id=#user_id# #idlist# #filters# #group_bys#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to filter to.

column.name: created_by_user
column.sql: CASE l.created_by_id WHEN #user_id# THEN true ELSE false END
